title: Baymax Blitzcrank?
body:
**Updated at 9:39pm 29/01/2015**

I probably should have put this on the player creations forum, but I don't think this constitutes a 'player creation' because Baymax is not my design.


So the actual idea of this skin is to have Blitzcrank in a similar suit of armour that Baymax has in Big Hero 6 (not the white cuddly interior of the hero armour). I could totally see this being a legendary {{champion:53}}  skin).

To avoid copyright issues this could totally go along with the superhero theme (e.g Super Teemo amd Super Rumble) and be called Super Blitzcrank.

**Q** - Similar to iBlitzcrank except his fist blasts off with fire effects

**W **- The red wings on his back expand out as shown in the picture as Blitz jetblasts along.

**E** - (Not 100% sure what could be done for this ability) Fist glows red with small puffs of steam coming out around the wrist joint of his armour.

**R** - Blue electricity explodes out from his core as his armor magnetizes off of his body (exposing the normal rusty blitzcrank under his superhero armour).

**Passive** - When the passive is down the purple/parts that aren't red lose their colour and go gray.

**Recall **- Blitzcrank poses with his fist in the air as his jetpack opens and launches himself upwards.

**Possible joke** (the video doesn't show the finished version of what he looks like)**:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zVLA8fvBczg 

**Possible taunt:** "On a scale of 1 to 10, what would you rate your pain?"/"What is your pain on a scale of 1 to 10?" (see: video below)

**Ideas for general chatter:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6R1R7_EgkFI 

**Death animation**: All armour falls off and interior body deflates.

**Concepts of Baymax/Super Blitzcrank:**

An idea has to start from somewhere, right? There are other skins such as Mecha Malphite, Mecha Aatrox (Pacific Rim), Popstar Ahri (came from a post on the NA forums requesting a Girls Generation Ahri skin), Super Teemo, Super Rumble (Gurren Laggan), (etc etc) all have taken ideas from someone else's material (It's not necessarily a bad thing). 

I'm just trying to throw out some ideas because a skin following this theme for Blitzcrank would be pretty awesome. It wouldn't be the first time Blitzcrank has a skin based off of something that isn't completely related to LoL lore *cough* iBlitzcrank.
Even like {{champion:8}}'s Nosferatu skin was taken from the first vampire movie made in 1922! (i think), and even {{champion:8}} himself is from someone else's idea!
